mapper.select: SELECT B.BADGE_ID as badgeId, B.BADGE_NAME as badgeName, B.BADGE_ICON_URL as badgeIconUrl FROM USERBADGE UB JOIN BADGE B ON UB.BADGE_ID = B.BADGE_ID WHERE UB.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERBADGE (USER_ID, BADGE_ID, EARNED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{badgeId}, SYSDATE)
